dct_title_s: Delineatio aureae Sterilitatis Herciniensis, i. e. Herciniae Metalliferæ accurata chorographia : omnes simul fodinas & loca nativa minerarum, quæ ibi effodiuntur, addita nomenclatura, distincte exhibens
dct_description_sm: Map of the Harz mining region; relief shown pictorially. "Cum Pr. S. C. Maj." Indexed to show the locations of mines and related mining activities.
dct_subject_sm: Mines and mineral resources—Germany—Harz Mountains—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Mines and mineral resources—Germany—Harz Mountains—Maps—Early works to 1800
